content.user_title: Add local LLM chat to React apps

Implement useBodhi hook for client access and auth state
Create streaming chat interface with AsyncGenerator pattern
Configure GitHub Pages deployment with basePath

limitations: Requires Bodhi App backend running locally
Requires OAuth client registration at developer portal
Chrome extension mode requires Bodhi Browser extension
Production deployment requires real domain for OAuth

faq.question: What is bodhi-js-sdk?
faq.answer: A TypeScript SDK for integrating local LLM capabilities into web apps using the Bodhi Browser ecosystem.

faq.question: What connection modes are supported?
faq.answer: Extension mode via Bodhi Browser extension and direct HTTP mode to local server at localhost:1135.

faq.question: How does OAuth work?
faq.answer: OAuth 2.0 + PKCE flow with automatic token refresh. Dev uses main-id.getbodhi.app, prod uses id.getbodhi.app.

faq.question: Is my data sent to external servers?
faq.answer: No. Bodhi connects to local LLM models through the Bodhi App backend. Only OAuth tokens are sent to auth servers.

faq.question: Why is chat not streaming?
faq.answer: Ensure stream: true in request and use for await loop. Check server is running at localhost:1135 and isAuthenticated is true.

faq.question: How is this different from OpenAI API?
faq.answer: Connects to local models instead of cloud API. Uses same OpenAI-compatible API pattern for familiarity.
